languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля звучит глухо, в нем слышатся отзвуки канонады битв далекого прошлого.{/n} "Грех. Разумный механизм, сотворенный человеком и более не нуждающийся в нем. Мятежный машинный дух, забывший, что Омниссия послал его к людям служить и помогать, а не существовать ради себя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Паскаля звучит глухо, в нем слышатся отзвуки канонады битв далекого прошлого.{/n} "Грех. Разумный механизм, сотворенный человеком и более не нуждающийся в нем. Мятежный машинный дух, забывший, что Омниссия послал его к людям служить и помогать, а не существовать ради себя".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds hollow and seems to carry echoes of cannonades of the distant past.{/n} "A transgression. A sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. A rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to serve and aid Humanity, not to exist for its own sake."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Паскаля звучит глухо, в нем слышатся отзвуки канонады битв далекого прошлого.{/n} "Грех. Разумный механизм, сотворенный человеком и более не нуждающийся в нем. Мятежный машинный дух, забывший, что Омниссия послал его к людям служить и помогать, а не существовать ради себя".

Sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. Rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to Humanity to serve and aid, not exist for its own sake."

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声は虚に響き、まるで遠い過去の連続砲撃の反響を伝えるようであった。{/n}「罪。人類の手によって創造された、しかしもうその主人を必要としない感傷の機構。それ自身のために存在するのではなく、彼らが人類に仕え助けるよう送り出した万機神の意志を忘れ去ってしまった反逆の機械精霊」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds hollow and seems to carry echoes of cannonades of the distant past.{/n} "A transgression. A sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. A rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to serve and aid Humanity, not to exist for its own sake."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声は虚に響き、まるで遠い過去の連続砲撃の反響を伝えるようであった。{/n}「罪。人類の手によって創造された、しかしもうその主人を必要としない感傷の機構。それ自身のために存在するのではなく、彼らが人類に仕え助けるよう送り出した万機神の意志を忘れ去ってしまった反逆の機械精霊」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音听起来很空洞，像是遥远战火的回声。{/n}“它是罪孽，由人类的双手创造，但不再需要主人存在的自主机械。那些叛逆的机魂忘记了欧姆尼塞亚的意志。它们本该服务人类，协助人类，不该为了自己的欲望而存在。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds hollow and seems to carry echoes of cannonades of the distant past.{/n} "A transgression. A sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. A rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to serve and aid Humanity, not to exist for its own sake."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音听起来很空洞，像是遥远战火的回声。{/n}“它是罪孽，由人类的双手创造，但不再需要主人存在的自主机械。那些叛逆的机魂忘记了欧姆尼塞亚的意志。它们本该服务人类，协助人类，不该为了自己的欲望而存在。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt hohl und scheint das Echo von Kanonaden aus ferner Vergangenheit in sich zu tragen.{/n} "Ein Verstoß. Ein denkender Mechanismus, von Menschenhand erschaffen, der aber seine Meister nicht länger benötigt. Ein rebellierender Maschinengeist, der den Willen des Omnissiah vergessen hat. Der Omnissiah hatte ihn geschickt, um der Menschheit zu dienen und zu helfen, nicht damit er um seiner selbst willen existiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds hollow and seems to carry echoes of cannonades of the distant past.{/n} "A transgression. A sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. A rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to serve and aid Humanity, not to exist for its own sake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt hohl und scheint das Echo von Kanonaden aus ferner Vergangenheit in sich zu tragen.{/n} "Ein Verstoß. Ein denkender Mechanismus, von Menschenhand erschaffen, der aber seine Meister nicht länger benötigt. Ein rebellierender Maschinengeist, der den Willen des Omnissiah vergessen hat. Der Omnissiah hatte ihn geschickt, um der Menschheit zu dienen und zu helfen, nicht damit er um seiner selbst willen existiert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix creuse de Pasqal semble faire écho aux canonnades d'un lointain passé.{/n} « Une transgression. Un mécanisme conscient créé par l'homme, mais qui n'a plus besoin de ses maîtres. Un esprit de la machine rebelle qui a tourné le dos à la volonté de l'Omnimessie pour exister de son propre chef au lieu de servir et d'aider l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds hollow and seems to carry echoes of cannonades of the distant past.{/n} "A transgression. A sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. A rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to serve and aid Humanity, not to exist for its own sake."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix creuse de Pasqal semble faire écho aux canonnades d'un lointain passé.{/n} « Une transgression. Un mécanisme conscient créé par l'homme, mais qui n'a plus besoin de ses maîtres. Un esprit de la machine rebelle qui a tourné le dos à la volonté de l'Omnimessie pour exister de son propre chef au lieu de servir et d'aider l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal habla con voz apagada, y en su tono resuenan las andanadas de un pasado remoto.{/n} «Una transgresión. Un mecanismo inteligente creado por manos humanas, pero que ya no necesita a sus amos. Un espíritu máquina rebelde que ha olvidado la voluntad del Omnissiah de enviarlo para servir y ayudar a la Humanidad, y no para llevar una existencia independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds hollow and seems to carry echoes of cannonades of the distant past.{/n} "A transgression. A sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. A rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to serve and aid Humanity, not to exist for its own sake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal habla con voz apagada, y en su tono resuenan las andanadas de un pasado remoto.{/n} «Una transgresión. Un mecanismo inteligente creado por manos humanas, pero que ya no necesita a sus amos. Un espíritu máquina rebelde que ha olvidado la voluntad del Omnissiah de enviarlo para servir y ayudar a la Humanidad, y no para llevar una existencia independiente».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi duygusuz çıkıyor, mazideki saldırıların yankılarını taşıyormuş izlenimi uyandırıyor.{/n} "Bir suç. İnsan eliyle yaratılmış, canlı fakat artık efendilerine ihtiyaç duymayan bir mekanizma. Bu asi makine ruhu; Hermesih tarafından insanlığa yardım ve hizmet için gönderildi, kendi için var olması amacıyla değil. Ancak kendisini gönderen Hermesih'in iradesini unuttu."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds hollow and seems to carry echoes of cannonades of the distant past.{/n} "A transgression. A sentient mechanism created by human hands but no longer needing its masters. A rebelling machine spirit that has forgotten the will of the Omnissiah who sent it to serve and aid Humanity, not to exist for its own sake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi duygusuz ve mazideki saldırıların yankılarını taşıyor izlenimi uyandırıyor.{/n} "Bir suç. İnsan eliyle yaratılmış canlı bir mekanizma ancak artık efendilerine ihtiyaç duymuyor. Bu asi makine ruhu, Hermesih tarafından insanlığa yardım ve hizmet için gönderildi, kendi için var olması amacıyla değil. Ancak kendisini gönderen Hermesih'in iradesini unuttu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
